title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 42, Episode 2 With Chris Ryan
description:
This week, Tyson and Riley are joined by The Ringer’s Chris Ryan to discuss Hai’s decision to eat meat and the possibility of losing something while on the island, and to break down the immunity challenge. Plus, they offer up strategy for using the "Shot in the Dark" more effectively and close by giving out this week’s superlatives.
Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Riley McAtee
Guest: Chris Ryan
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
